newsitem.title: USA: Intergraph sues to see Bentley Systems records.
newsitem.headline: Intergraph sues to see Bentley Systems records.

text.p: Intergraph Corp has sued to see the books and records of Bentley Systems Inc, according to papers filed in the Delaware Chancery Court.
Intergraph does not specify in court information papers the reason for wanting to see the records. The complaint itself is not yet available from the court.
In July, Intergraph said it wanted to sell its 50 percent stake in Bentley. Until 1995 Intergraph was the exclusive distributor of Bentley products.
Intergraph, of Huntsville, Alabama, produces data management and graphics applications software for computer- aided design, management and engineering.
Bentley, of Exton, Pennsylvania, produces engineering software including MicroStation desktop products.
